game.name: Asphalt Speed Racing 3D
game.description:
Asphalt Speed Racing is a latest high-speed 3d car racing games specially designed for speed lovers. In this exclusively-designed free online racing game for boys, you have to drive your car on different tracks at high speed. It will surely be a huge fun when you take a chance to participate in either single championship or race. So, what are you waiting for? Get ready to burn some rubber of your car on the street in this highly challenging game.?

This cool flash game will surely give you a chance to become an expert racer while completing all its levels. Come forward to show your driving skills to the whole world by taking part in a single race or tournament game. Do not forget to collect the cash that you see on your way and upgrade your car to the optimum possible level and get a chance to become the new asphalt king. Let prove the world that you are the best racer in this exclusive thrilling  3d car racing game.

One of the best 3D car racing games to play for boys, Asphalt Speed Racing features awesome 9 tracks including 25 unique racing cars and different variations. You can play this cool car game through two ways ? by taking part in the championship mode. So, why are you wasting your time? Get your car ready, purchase the latest ones and drift it with the high-speed around the corners of the tracks. Ride your car for the victory on city tracks, snow tracks, forest tracks, desert tracks and classic Racetracks.
